sentences.en: " Let me see your license and registration, " Neri said.
sentences.cn: “ 让我看看你的执照和登记卡, ” 奈里说.

sentences.en: Another driver managed to get the registration number of the car.
sentences.cn: 另一名司机看清了该车的车牌号。

sentences.en: At registration I had trouble picking out my courses.
sentences.cn: 注册时,我不知道选读哪门功课好.

sentences.en: Investigate the system used for allocating car registration numbers.
sentences.cn: 研究一下用来规定汽车登记号码的一套方法.

sentences.en: Marriage without registration is not recognized by law.
sentences.cn: 法律不承认未登记的婚姻.

sentences.en: Marriage without registration will not be recognized by the law.
sentences.cn: 没登记就结婚,法律是不承认的.

sentences.en: Please write your home address on the registration form.
sentences.cn: 请在这张登记表上写下你的家庭住址.

sentences.en: Student registration (= for a course of study ) starts the first week in September.
sentences.cn: 学生注册在9月份的第一个星期开始。

sentences.en: The registration form showed his date of birth as August 2, 1979.
sentences.cn: 登记表显示他的出生日期是1979年8月2号。

sentences.en: the registration of letters and parcels
The registration of students for the course will begin on Thursday morning.
sentences.cn: 学生登记上的这门课将于星期四上午开始.

sentences.en: The registration of the university shows an increase of 10 percent over last year.
sentences.cn: 这所大学的注册人数比去年递增了10%.

sentences.en: They charge a small registration fee.
They have campaigned strongly for compulsory registration of dogs.
sentences.cn: 他们强烈呼吁实行犬类强制登记。

sentences.en: Would you fill in this registration form?
sentences.cn: 麻烦填写这张住宿登记表.

words.tran_cn: 注册的；记名的；登记过的；（家畜等）附有血统证明的
登记；注册；记录；寄存器；登记簿
登记员；注册主任；专科住院医师
注册；登记处；挂号处；船舶的国籍
登记；注册；记录；挂号邮寄；把…挂号；正式提出

phrases.tran_cn: 登记证；注册证书；注册证明
注册费，登记费；挂号费；更名费
n. 汽车牌照号码，（软件）注册号
车辆登记；车辆注册登记

trans.tran_cn: 登记，注册，挂号，登记（或注册、挂号）人数，<音>（管风琴）音栓配合（法）
trans.tran_en: the act of recording names and details on an official list
